title: Angie Kent gushes over Bachelorette star Carlin Sterritt during cocktail party
text:
The Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt looks to be a strong contender to win the show.

In a teaser shared by Channel 10 to YouTube on Sunday, Angie Kent appears beyond smitten with the Sydney-based personal trainer after their first meeting.

'He is one good looking sort,' gushed the flustered star, after Carlin, 30, introduced himself before entering the first cocktail party.

Is this The Bachelorette winner? Angie Kent (left) gushes over Carlin Sterritt (right) in a teaser trailer shared on Sunday as he kisses her during their first meeting

'I'm Carlin, nice to meet you, a pleasure,' began the hunk on the red carpet.

Wearing a crisp white tuxedo, the muscle-clad contestant then gave Angie a kiss on the cheek, instantly sending her weak at the knees.

'Hot diggity damn,' said Angie to producers afterwords, while struggling to speak.

Sealed with a kiss! 'He is one good looking sort,' gushed the unusually speechless star, after Carlin, 30, introduced himself before entering the first cocktail party

Speechless! 'Hot diggity damn,' said Angie to producers afterwords, while struggling to speak

Angie continued: 'He is one good looking sort, that white suit was just, ahh.'

Speaking to 10 Daily ahead of Wednesday's premiere, Carlin gushed over Angie.

'I think she is beautiful, genuine, funny and seems to have those girl next door qualities,' he admitted.

He believes his exes would describe him as 'kind, passionate, confident.'

'I think she is beautiful, genuine, funny and seems to have those girl next door qualities': Speaking to 10 Daily ahead of Wednesday's premiere, Carlin gushed over Angie

Hunk! The 30-year-old currently works as a trainer for the fitness chain F45 in Sydney, but he's also a part-time actor on the side with a number of roles under his belt

The musclebound Lothario currently works as a trainer for the fitness chain F45 in Sydney, but he's also a part-time actor on the side with a number of roles under his belt.

Over the years, Carlin's appeared in commercials for well-known brands including McDonald's, Huawei and Bundaberg.

More recently, he starred as the lead in the independent thriller Out of the Woods.

Outside of acting, Carlin's found success as both a model and a social media influencer.
description: The Bachelorette's Carlin Sterritt looks to be a strong contender to win the show.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
